title: Ping suddenly increased!?
body:
Hello, I live in Asia but I play in NA server because most of my friends plays in it and the ping was fine. The ping was ~200 and it wasn't too bad but few weeks ago my ping suddenly increased from ~200 to constant 240-250 making it unplayable.. I contacted riot already but they haven't got a solution.

Tests connecting to Chicago:
Pingtest: http://www.pingtest.net/result/151989783.png
Speedtest: http://www.speedtest.net/my-result/5637387791

replies.body: Looking into this, I wasn't able to see any ticket submissions about this.  Ping issues can be due to network issues like a weak connection or packet loss.  In this case, you have the physical distance of reaching to our servers, which will definitely cause some ping discrepancies.  Meaning, no matter how much we improve your connection it can't exceed the expectation of that distance.  With that in mind, I suggest using our [connection issues](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/201752664-Troubleshooting-Connection-Issues) guide to help improve your network as much as possible.  I hope it helps!
I've tried a lot of methods, none works so I guess I'll just leave it be.

... what champs do you play that are playable at even 200ms ping.

becuase i am also having ping issues (likely unrelated) where it spikes to about 230

but the fact that you are even willing to play on 200 ms ping impresses me... i consider anything above about 100 unplayable

it would be good to learn some champs that are able to play at high ping so i can at least get my first win of the day until i get my ping issue solved
I know 200ms is disgusting but I'm kinda used to it as i played loads of games with 200ms so it isn't too horrible playing with 200ms for me.
